author: craigmcc
msg: Eliminate variable declarations that duplicate variabes declared in the
base class (JDBCDynaClass).  Among other things, this causes any value set
for "lowerCase" in the constructor of ResultSetDynaClass to be ignored.
Submitted By:  Fabio Grassi (fabio DOT grassi AT ggsinformatica DOT it)

author: craigmcc
msg: Make it possible for RowSetDynaClass subclasses to easily use a different
implementation of DynaBean for the beans returned by copy().
Submitted By:  Yen Snow (yennersnow AT yahoo DOT com)
